channel.title: Pastry on Pillow
channel.description: Recent content in Pastry on Pillow

item.title: Lebkuchen Kuchen
item.description: A childhood favourite, a very juice cake that gets better with time in the fridge, as the dough soaks through and gets even juicier.

item.title: Nussecken
item.description: Still room for improvement. But generally good.
